gyldighed.name: Validhoures
gyldighed.text: Forecast, valid to the 8. August 12 UTC. Issued at 11.35 UTC.

oversigt.name: Synoptic situation
oversigt.text: A low, 1008 hPa, over Narsalik and another low, 1010 hPa, east of Narsalik, are both slowly moving towards northeast while filling. Associated fronts give rain to the southern, southwestern and southeastern waters. Otherwise high pressure weather. A new low, about 1000 hPa, over New Foundland, is moving towards northeast and an associated front with rain reaches the southwestern waters during the night. Over all waters locally fog and patches of fog.

udsigtfordaneborg.name: Forecast for Daneborg
udsigtfordaneborg.text: South 6 to 11 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesdaneborg.name: Waves Daneborg
wavesdaneborg.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1 m.

icedaneborg.name: Ice_Daneborg
icedaneborg.text: Old ice and thick first-year ice in the western and northern part, but open water in the southeastern part. Few icebergs and growlers throughout the area.

udsigtforkangikajik.name: Forecast for Kangikajik
udsigtforkangikajik.text: Southwest 8 to 13 m/s. Very poor visibility.

waveskangikajik.name: Waves Kangikajik
waveskangikajik.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1 m.

icekangikajik.name: Ice_Kangikajik
icekangikajik.text: Old ice and thick first-year ice in the western and southern part. Scattered icebergs and growlers in the western part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforaputiteeq.name: Forecast for Aputiteeq
udsigtforaputiteeq.text: Southwest 8 to 13 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesaputiteeq.name: Waves Aputiteeq
wavesaputiteeq.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1 m.

iceaputiteeq.name: Ice_Aputiteeq
iceaputiteeq.text: Old ice and thick first-year ice in the northern part and in the western part along the coast. Scattered icebergs and growlers in the western part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforkulusuk.name: Forecast for Kulusuk
udsigtforkulusuk.text: South 3 to 8 m/s. Good visibility. This night south 3 to 8 m/s. And in southwestern part north 3 to 8 m/s. Good visibility. Tomorrow early north 1 to 6 m/s. And in northeastern part south 2 to 7 m/s. Good visibility.

waveskulusuk.name: Waves Kulusuk
waveskulusuk.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.

icekulusuk.name: Ice_Kulusuk
icekulusuk.text: Strips of old ice in the northwestern part along the coast. Scattered icebergs and growlers in the western part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfortimmiarmiut.name: Forecast for Timmiarmiut
udsigtfortimmiarmiut.text: South 2 to 7 m/s. And in southwestern part variable below 5 m/s. Poor to good visibility. This evening south 2 to 7 m/s. Very poor visibility. This night and tomorrow early southwest 6 to 11 m/s. And in northwestern part north 2 to 7 m/s. Very poor to poor visibility.

wavestimmiarmiut.name: Waves Timmiarmiut
wavestimmiarmiut.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

icetimmiarmiut.name: Ice_Timmiarmiut
icetimmiarmiut.text: Few areas with old ice in the westernmost part along the coast. Scattered icebergs and growlers in the western part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kangia
udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.text: Southwest 2 to 7 m/s. And in northwestern part northeast 1 to 6 m/s. Very poor visibility. This evening, this night and tomorrow early southwest 5 to 10 m/s. Very poor visibility.

waveskangia.name: Waves Nunap Isuata Kangia
waveskangia.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

icenunapisuatakangia.name: Ice_Nunapisuatakangia
icenunapisuatakangia.text: Scattered icebergs and growlers in the northwestern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kitaa
udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.text: South 4 to 9 m/s. And in northeastern part east 3 to 8 m/s. Very poor visibility. This evening, this night and tomorrow early southeast 5 to 10 m/s. Very poor visibility.

waveskitaa.name: Waves Isuata Kitaa
waveskitaa.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

icenunapisuatakitaa.name: Ice_Nunapisuatakitaa
icenunapisuatakitaa.text: Many icebergs and growlers in the northern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfornunarsuit.name: Forecast for Nunarsuit
udsigtfornunarsuit.text: Southeast 7 to 12 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesnunarsuit.name: Waves Nunarsuit
wavesnunarsuit.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

icenunarsuit.name: Ice_Nunarsuit
icenunarsuit.text: Many icebergs and growlers in the eastern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfornarsalik.name: Forecast for Narsalik
udsigtfornarsalik.text: Southeast 8 to 13 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesnarsalik.name: Waves Narsalik
wavesnarsalik.text: Significant wave height: 2,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtformeqquitsoq.name: Forecast for Meqquitsoq
udsigtformeqquitsoq.text: North 4 to 9 m/s. And in southeastern part southeast 2 to 7 m/s. Good visibility. This evening and this night north 5 to 10 m/s. Good visibility. Tomorrow early northeast 5 to 10 m/s. And in southeastern part southeast 3 to 8 m/s. Moderate visibility.

wavesmeqquitsoq.name: Waves Meqquitsoq
wavesmeqquitsoq.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

wavesattu.name: Waves Attu
wavesattu.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtforuiffaq.name: Forecast for Uiffaq
udsigtforuiffaq.text: Northwest 2 to 7 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesuiffaq.name: Waves Uiffaq
wavesuiffaq.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 0,5 m.

iceuiffaq.name: Ice_Uiffaq
iceuiffaq.text: Many icebergs and growlers in the eastern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.name: Forecast for Qimusseriarsuaq
udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.text: Variable below 5 m/s. Very poor visibility. This night in western part south 2 to 7 m/s. And in eastern part variable below 5 m/s. Very poor to good visibility. Tomorrow early southeast 4 to 9 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesqimusseriarsuaq.name: Waves Qimusseriarsuaq
wavesqimusseriarsuaq.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 0,5 m.

iceqimusseriarsuaq.name: Ice_Qimusseriarsuaq
iceqimusseriarsuaq.text: Strips of thick first-year ice in the northeasternmost part along the coast. Many icebergs and growlers in the eastern part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

waveskiatak.name: Waves Kiatak
waveskiatak.text: Significant wave height: 0,5 m. Swells: 0,5 m.

icekiatak.name: Ice_Kiatak
icekiatak.text: Old ice and thick first-year ice in the northernmost part. Scattered icebergs and growlers throughout the area.
